DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find tadalafil help overweight obese people metabolize blood sugar efficiently . The investigator also want find 20 mg/day tadalafil 3 month safe take without cause many side effect . The investigator plan enroll 100 subject Massachusetts General Hospital ( MGH ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine change insulin resistance glucose tolerance follow 3 month treatment oral , daily tadalafil . The investigator primary hypothesis measurable decrease insulin resistance ( measure HOMA-IR ) increase insulin sensitivity ( measure Matsuda index ) occur follow 3 month treatment oral tadalafil 20 mg daily compare placebo . The investigator secondary hypothesis improvement average glycemia ( measure hemoglobin A1C ) , pancreatic beta cell function ( measure oral disposition index ) , body composition ( include weight , waist circumference , body mass index , waist-hip ratio ) occur result tadalafil-mediated change cGMP pathway .
